casebody.data:
Jacqueline UTKIN, Successor Trustee to the Christian Family Trust, Dated October 11, 2016, Petitioner,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Vincent Ochoa, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Susan Christian-Payne; Rosemary Keach; Raymond Christian, Jr.; Monte Reason; Tommy L. Christian; and Christopher A. Christian, Real Parties in Interest. No. 76053 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED JUNE 21, 2018

DENIED.
